questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
parts: (a) when the rehabilitation of the Mukobeko-Mpunde-Lukanga road in Kapiri-Mposhi District will commence;
(b) whether the Government has any plans to tar the road;
(c) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why. QUESTIONS FOR WRITTEN ANSWER W5. Mr Michelo (Bweengwa) - to ask the Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development:
(a) what the distribution of roads under the Link Zambia 8000 Road Programme by kilometre, province by province, is;
(b) at what stage of completion, in percentage terms, each road was, as of July, 2020; and
(c) what criteria were used to identify the roads in each province. W6. Mrs M L Phiri (Chilanga) - to ask the Minister of Local Government:
(a) in which districts the Government was constructing the following infrastructure as of July, 2020:
(i) modern markets; and (ii) intercity bus termini;
(b) whether the Government has any plans to construct the infrastructure above in all provincial centres; and
(c) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
